name: MagiGun: Final Answer
description:
hey thanks for playing. this is my first gamejam and i think i did well for what it's worth. i may iterate on this in the future.

Assets that aren't mine:

Font is from Earthbound

Title music is Shine Get by Aethernaut 

In-Game music is Pixel Galaxy by Ujico/Snail's House

Go check out the other games from the jam. the ones i've played were pretty awesome

Me youtube
